statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 15 \\ -8 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 6 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ -41 \\ 13 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
